class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        
        # 初始化指针
        i = len(horizontalCut) - 1
        j = len(verticalCut) - 1
        
        # 初始化总开销
        total_cost = 0
        
        # 交替进行水平切割和垂直切割
        while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                total_cost += horizontalCut[i] * (n-j-1)  # 乘以当前剩余的垂直切割次数
                i -= 1
            else:
                total_cost += verticalCut[j] * (m-1-i)  # 乘以当前剩余的水平切割次数
                j -= 1
        print(total_cost,i,j)
        # 处理剩余的切割
        while i >= 0:
            total_cost += horizontalCut[i] * (n-j-1)
            i -= 1
        
        while j >= 0:
            total_cost += verticalCut[j] * (m-1-i)
            j -= 1
        
        return total_cost
